page.title: 06Employment in the Area
page.content:
This information was gathered from {Chippenham Job Centre}in June 1985.
The main employer, until closure in 1982, was{Harris's Meat Products.}The closure caused severe unemployment. The main employers now are{Calne {Cabinet Makers}and{Kwik Save supermarket and warehouse.
Despite having 23 farms in the area comparatively few people are employed in farming.
A lot of people who live in{Cherhill work outside of the area in such places as{Newbury, Malmesbury, Bath} and even {London.
The{June 1985 unemployment figure}for the Chippenham,Malmesbury and Calne area is{2578}people unemployed.
